glsa.title: WebP: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: An integer overflow vulnerability in WebP could lead to arbitrary code execution or Denial of Service.

background.p: WebP is a lossy image compression format.

description.p: An integer overflow flaw has been found in WebP.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image in an application linked against WebP, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All WebP users should upgrade to the latest version:
